sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_menu (
menucode
systemcode
menuname
funcentry
menulevel
parentmenucode
menufullcode
nodeorder
isleaf
menuTypeCode
menuTypeName
) values (
#menucode#
#systemcode#
#menuname#
#funcentry#
#menulevel#
#parentmenucode#
#menufullcode#
#nodeorder#
#isleaf#
#menuTypeCode#
#menuTypeName#
)
sqlMap.update:
update t_menu a set menucode=menucode
systemcode=#systemcode#
menuname=#menuname#
funcentry=#funcentry#
menulevel=#menulevel#
parentmenucode=#parentmenucode#
menufullcode=#menufullcode#
nodeorder=#nodeorder#
isleaf=#isleaf#
menuTypeCode=#menuTypeCode#
menuTypeName=#menuTypeName#
where 1=1
sqlMap.select:
select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.menucode menucode,a.systemcode systemcode,a.menuname menuname, a.funcentry funcentry,a.menulevel menulevel,a.parentmenucode parentmenucode, a.menufullcode menufullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.menuTypeCode menuTypeCode,a.menuTypeName menuTypeName, nvl(b.menuname,'顶级') parentmenuname from t_menu a,(select menucode,menuname from t_menu t )b where a.parentmenucode=b.menucode(+)
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$
select count(1) a from t_menu a,(select menucode,menuname from t_menu t )b where a.parentmenucode=b.menucode(+)

select a.menucode menucode,a.systemcode systemcode,a.menuname menuname,a.funcentry funcentry,a.menulevel menulevel,a.parentmenucode parentmenucode,a.menufullcode menufullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf ,a.menuTypeCode menuTypeCode,a.menuTypeName menuTypeName from t_menu a where 1=1
order by a.menucode,a.systemcode

select a.menucode menucode,a.systemcode systemcode,a.menuname menuname, a.funcentry funcentry,a.menulevel menulevel,a.parentmenucode parentmenucode, a.menufullcode menufullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.menuTypeCode menuTypeCode,a.menuTypeName menuTypeName, nvl(b.menuname,'顶级') parentmenuname from t_menu a,(select menucode,menuname from t_menu t )b where a.parentmenucode=b.menucode(+)
order by a.menucode,a.systemcode

select a.menucode menucode,a.systemcode systemcode,a.menuname menuname,a.funcentry funcentry,a.menulevel menulevel,a.parentmenucode parentmenucode,a.menufullcode menufullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf ,a.menuTypeCode menuTypeCode,a.menuTypeName menuTypeName from t_menu a where a.parentmenucode = #menucode#
a.systemcode = #systemcode#
order by nodeorder

select a.menucode menucode,a.systemcode systemcode,a.menuname menuname,a.funcentry funcentry, a.menulevel menulevel,a.parentmenucode parentmenucode,a.menufullcode menufullcode, a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf ,a.menuTypeCode menuTypeCode,a.menuTypeName menuTypeName from t_menu a , (select t.nodeorder, t.menucode from t_menu t) b where a.parentmenucode = b.menucode(+) and a.menucode in (select menucode from t_role_menu where roleid in (select roleid from t_user_role where userid =#userid#))
a.menucode not in($menucodein$)
a.menufullcode like #fullcodelike#
a.systemcode =#systemcode#
a.menucode =#menucode#
a.menulevel =#menulevel#
a.parentmenucode =#parentmenucode#
a.menufullcode =#menufullcode#
a.isleaf =#isleaf#
a.menuTypeCode =#menuTypeCode#
(instr(a.menufullcode,a.menucode)>1 or a.menucode='xtgl_g' or a.menucode = 'usbkey_qyd' or a.systemcode='zcd')
order by nvl(b.nodeorder, 0) + nodeOrder asc
select count(1) from t_role_menu where roleid in (select roleid from t_user_role where userid =#userid#) and menucode = #menucode#
select count(1) from t_menu where parentmenucode = #parentmenucode#

select a.menucode menucode,a.systemcode systemcode,a.menuname menuname,a.funcentry funcentry,a.menulevel menulevel,a.parentmenucode parentmenucode,a.menufullcode menufullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf ,a.menuTypeCode menuTypeCode,a.menuTypeName menuTypeName from t_menu a where menucode= #parentmenucode#

select a.menucode menucode,a.systemcode systemcode,a.menuname menuname,a.funcentry funcentry,a.menulevel menulevel,a.parentmenucode parentmenucode,a.menufullcode menufullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf ,a.menuTypeCode menuTypeCode,a.menuTypeName menuTypeName from t_menu a where menufullcode like '%#menucode#%' and menucode <> #menucode# order by nodeorder

select a.menucode menucode,a.systemcode systemcode,a.menuname menuname,a.funcentry funcentry,a.menulevel menulevel,a.parentmenucode parentmenucode,a.menufullcode menufullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf ,a.menuTypeCode menuTypeCode,a.menuTypeName menuTypeName from t_menu a order by nodeOrder

select a.menucode menucode,a.systemcode systemcode,a.menuname menuname,a.funcentry funcentry,a.menulevel menulevel,a.parentmenucode parentmenucode,a.menufullcode menufullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf ,a.menuTypeCode menuTypeCode,a.menuTypeName menuTypeName from t_menu a where systemcode=#systemcode# order by nodeOrder

select nvl((max(a.nodeorder)+1),0) nodeorder from t_menu a where 1=1
a.parentmenucode = #parentmenucode#
a.systemcode = #systemcode#

select distinct a.menucode menucode,a.systemcode systemcode,a.menuname menuname,a.funcentry funcentry, a.menulevel menulevel,a.parentmenucode parentmenucode,a.menufullcode menufullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder, a.isleaf isleaf,a.menuTypeCode menuTypeCode,a.menuTypeName menuTypeName from t_menu a,t_user b,t_user_role c,t_role_menu d where b.userid = c.userid and c.roleid = d.roleid and a.menucode = d.menucode and a.parentmenucode = #menucode#
a.systemcode = #systemcode#
b.userid = #userid#
order by nodeorder
